message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique product that I think you'll love. I'm looking for $120 for it. Would you be interested in making a deal?
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105. Would you be willing to go for that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $100, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to do $92?
I'm really close to my minimum price now, Bob. I can do $99, but that's it. Would you be willing to meet me at $99?
I'm really close to buying from John at $80, but I still want to see if we can come to an agreement. Would you be willing to do $95?
